Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: I place a lot more trust in what my teacher says in their feedback than AI.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: AI is more accessible and go into more detail than teachers easily can. More accessible is the big bonus though.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: GenAI will sometimes go off on a wild tangent with information that has nothing to do with the question. i.e. making stuff up with complete confidence
